subject: Hybrid WAN SD-WAN for OT Network
requirements:
Evaluate Fortinet vs Palo Alto for a 5-year SD-WAN hybrid WAN deployment
for an Operational Technology (OT) environment.

Include:
- Security posture comparison
- OT segmentation
- SASE capability
- 5 year TCO
- Vendor roadmap
- Risk analysis
- Governance alignment
- Executive summary
